publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Song of Songs 2
ab.l: Ḿeń giĺafligi toḥ jerniń giĺafligi ol ėnišĺarniń.
Ńečik giĺaflik t́eǵańaklari arasyna alej umasy Jiśraʾeĺniń ol uluslar arasyna.
Ńečik almalyḥ aɣačlary ara- syna ol ormannyn alaj śuv́arim ol umalar arasyna ḱoĺaǵa- sińd́a suqlandym da olturdum da jemiši tatlydyr tanlajyma.
Keĺtirdi ḿeni Sinaj tavɣa ki anda b́erdi Torany da alamyn üśt́uḿa jajdy śuv́arlik byla.
Kipĺajiź ḿeni fleš́ḱaĺar byla t́oš́ajiź ḿeni almalar byla ki śuv́arlikt́ań ḥasta ḿeń.

Son qolu bašym t́ub́uńa da on
qolu kučup tuttu ḿeni.
Ant́et́tiŕamiń siźni qyzlary Jerušalajimniń jurĺar byla hem oĺeńĺar byla ol t́uźńuń ėǵer ojatsajyz da ėǵer qozɣasajyz ol śuv́arlikni negińč́a ki öźu kĺagej.
Avazy śuv́ar T́eń- rimniń muna bu keĺadir śekirǵalejdir ol tavlar üśt́uńa bajejdir ol qajalar üśt́uńa.
Ušejdir śuv́arim jurǵa hem soɣaɣyna ol oleńĺarniń muna bu turadyr farstymyz artyna baɣadyr ol t́eŕaž́aĺard́ań ḱoźlejdir bijikt́agi ačylmaḥlardan.
Qaruv b́erdi śuv́arim da ajtty maja turɣun öźuja dostqam ḱorkĺuč́am da barɣyn öźuja.
Ki muna ol jaz bašy ašty ol jamɣur ašyp bardy öźuńa.
Ol č́eč́akĺar ḱoŕuńd́uĺar jerd́a vaḥty ol solov́ejniń jet́ti da avazy ol b́edańanyn ėšitiĺdi jerimiźd́a.
Ol inǯirlik jet́kirdi jetiĺḿaǵań jemišĺariń da ol borlalyḥ jetilḿajińč́a b́erdiĺar ijiś turɣun öźuja śuv́aŕ uma ḱorkĺuč́am da barɣyn öźuja.
Ḱoǵurč́uńum bučḥaḥlarynda ol skalanyn syjynčynda ol jerǵaniń ḱorǵuźǵuń maja ḱoŕumĺarijni ėšit́tirgiń maja avazyjny ki avazyj śeniń č́eb́ardir da ḱoŕuḿuj śeniń jarašlydyr.
Tutujuz biźǵa t́ul- ḱuĺarni kiči t́ulḱuĺarni č́ejpavč́uĺar baḥčalarny da baḥčamyz ješilḿaǵań.
Śuv́ar T́eńrim bolušluḥ maja da ḿeń išanamyn anar ol ḱut́uvč́u giĺaflikĺard́a.
Ńegińč́a ki ürgej jeli ol ḱuńńuń da qačḥyjlar ol ḱoĺaǵaĺar qajyrylɣyn ušaɣyn öźuja śuv́arim jurǵa hem soɣaɣyna ol oleńĺarniń jalan tavlar üśt́uńa.

app.note: The incipit of Song 2.2 is erroneously marked with bold square letters as the beginning of the chapter.
